txt.en: 'So you have seen the work-area, have you? The mayor will be most displeased if he finds that out, but I won't tell him you asked, as long as you don't tell him I told! Those workers haven't had a day off since the mayor took his seat last year, poor souls. After the mayor took jobs away from the people who stood up to him, they've been afraid to do anything but keep their heads down and their hands busy. But do you like the festival? Their hard work made it possible, you know.'
